query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sales) as total_vendas,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_suppliers) as total_fornecedores,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inventory) as total_estoque,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products) as total_produtos;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2JcS2SMt4kXiaZg.root --database e5hjdPqiFqSfQ5APk99tn8 --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sales) as total_vendas,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_suppliers) as total_fornecedores,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inventory) as total_estoque,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products) as total_produtos;
